artist: Itō Shinsui; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait; nude woman standing on a rock, water at R, washing her PR foot with a blue and white cloth; orange leaves, ULC, with fallen leaves on rocks
markings: LLC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第参拾九番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai sanjūkyū ban} (edition of 250, number 39) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui); LLC in pencil: ほお {hoo}
title: Fragrance of the Hot-spring
